channel.title: Project pk 525
channel.description:
[b] [/b]
[b]Features:[/b] - Skulls working 100% - All specs workin With real spec bar + Draining and refilling using our OWN method. - PvP Drops in Varrock Wildy (It's free for all there - Basic lunar magic + working veng - Defence with defence anims - Real maxhits - Piety works(+23%damage) - Full dharok/ Full void melee/ Full void range works - Wildernes levels and real old wild pk places - Alot of specs. Soon adding g maul near 99% real one.(it was no delay to att so u can hit spec spec =p). - Vengeance - Fully workin Banking - Auto retailate workin. - Real Drops in BH - BH Workin - NEW:PRIVATE CHAT - TRADING - you can only do ::starter cmd once now. - Super str pot(item 2440) - Commands - Magic on player Including Ice barrage + Miasmic Barrage. - Bonuses on interface - Castle wars home - Castle wars tele's u to BH , Varrock Wildy where it's free for all. - Zamorak godsword with freezedelay and correct gfx. - you can now do home tele on normal,ancient and lunar spelbook. - Dharok maxing added with low hp u can hit over 90s. - Commands added like ::master, pure,zerkpure - Fully working mage bank (gharok teleport.
[b]goals:[/b] full ancients 30% better pvp drops 70% making private messaging 100% currently 80% npc combat 10%
pictures
Dharok maxing the other dude has like 4 hp http://img193.imageshack.us/my.php?image=dharokmaxing.png&via=tfrog
[b]video's made by my players.[/b] pk vid http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lsuOYQaw26A a clan war some1 made http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pp-5moo_oyo pk vid 2 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcFtMDOh_4U
[center][img]http://moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] This isn't the place to advertise.[/center]

Allstar really gud source tho =)[/quote]If your talking about farcasting it’s not that hard to add you know?

item.title: Project pk 525
item.dc:creator: @ggggg ggggg
item.description:
@ggggg wrote:


Features:

  • Skulls working 100%
  • All specs workin With real spec bar + Draining and refilling using our OWN method.
  • PvP Drops in Varrock Wildy (It’s free for all there
  • Basic lunar magic + working veng
  • Defence with defence anims
  • Real maxhits
  • Piety works(+23%damage)
  • Full dharok/ Full void melee/ Full void range works
  • Wildernes levels and real old wild pk places
  • Alot of specs. Soon adding g maul near 99% real one.(it was no delay to att so u can hit spec spec =p).
  • Vengeance
  • Fully workin Banking
  • Auto retailate workin.
  • Real Drops in BH
  • BH Workin
  • NEW:PRIVATE CHAT
  • TRADING
  • you can only do ::starter cmd once now.
  • Super str pot(item 2440)
  • Commands
  • Magic on player Including Ice barrage + Miasmic Barrage.
  • Bonuses on interface
  • Castle wars home
  • Castle wars tele’s u to BH , Varrock Wildy where it’s free for all.
  • Zamorak godsword with freezedelay and correct gfx.
  • you can now do home tele on normal,ancient and lunar spelbook.
  • Dharok maxing added with low hp u can hit over 90s.
  • Commands added like ::master, pure,zerkpure
  • Fully working mage bank (gharok teleport.

goals:
full ancients 30%
better pvp drops 70%
making private messaging 100% currently 80%
npc combat 10%

pictures
